page.title: 04BRISTOL POLICEMAN'S VIEW
page.content: {Westbury Park}does not need normal policing.Community policing is the most effective,one policeman to one area,reminding people to renew motor taxes,trying to be seen to care and help.In response they are good informants and help to keep an eye on other people's property. A cross_section of the people would be cosmopolitan,fairly intelligent and professional.They try to raise the standard of the area.There is little trouble but a lot of crime. There are two or three burglaries a night,but I have only experienced one case of real violence.Young families and students living in flats, are often replacing older people living in whole houses. My main contact with children is my relationship with the local primary school and with those who come to my swimming club. {
